author: DefyingMyKarma
text: Time to see if Russian Doll is worth it and can be a day fixer. Oh, I'm a professional streamer. I'm mentally ill so I binge Netflix non-stop. And art stuff sometimes.

author: DefyingMyKarma
text: Getting back to stencil work while I start #HoldTight Round 2 lol. I dig European shows on Netflix allot. There's something different about them that almost always makes em resonate more then US shows.

author: DefyingMyKarma
text:
Hey @netflix Hold Tight series needs English translations for all the text message shots in the series. I'm missing so much because I can't read the language. It's a good show but it could be better and more inclusive. 
You've done it on other shows. Please and thanks.
